title: Cairn BRAVe e-bike closes more affordable adventure gap between e-gravel & eMTB
content:
This new Cairn Brave e-bike aims to open off-road adventure to more riders, pairing an affordable alloy mountain bike frame and its Shimano E7000 powertrain with either flat bar or drop-bar builds to suit individual style.
